title: Development of Automatic Cross-Sectional Scanning-Electron-Microscope-Observation Technique using Image Recognition of Semiconductor-Device Structure
content: Structures of cutting-edge semiconductor-device elements, such as fin field-effect transistors and 3D-NAND, have been miniaturized to nanoscale and become more complex. Therefore, it is becoming increasingly difficult to fabricate the structure into an ideal profile. It is necessary to fabricate a large number of test samples and analyze fabricated profiles for obtaining the ideal profile. The cross-section of fabricated profiles is observed using an electron microscope. The observations are currently done manually and require a large amount of labor and time. To reduce such costs, we study an automatic observation technique for a cross-sectional scanning electron microscope (X-SEM).
